description: Kusakabe Rin aka. Ash Roller is a level 5 linker of Green Legion. She is Fuuko`s child. In real life, she`s little sister of Ash Roller and she also share his linker identity with him. She is a shy girl who has self-esteem problems like Haruyuki. She met Fuuko when she working part-time job for money for her brother (A motorbike racer who also the one who operate Ash Roller) because he got coma and currently laying in hospital. She`s the special case in Brain Burst (she`s the owner of Ash Roller, technically). She can see what her brother doing in Brain Burst but they can`t communicate each other, it is the same case with Ash Roller. Fuuko is the only one who Ash Roller respect.
name: Kusakabe Rin
